properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 4:31PM AKST until January 18 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. The cold wind chills
will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed
skin. Expect wind chills to 40 below zero.

* WHERE...Deltana and Tanana Flats.

* WHEN...6 AM Thursday to 3 PM Saturday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds of 25 to 35 are expected to
develop Thursday and cause very cold wind chills that will
persist into Saturday. The strongest winds and coldest wind
chills are expected near Delta Junction. Travelers should be
prepared for drifting snow and very cold wind chills.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 3 PM AKST SATURDAY
